text: Black Angel is a 1946 American crime drama movie directed by Roy William Neill and was based on the 1943 novel of the same name by Cornell Woolrich. It stars Dan Duryea, June Vincent, Peter Lorre, Broderick Crawford, Constance Dowling, Wallace Ford, Hobart Cavanaugh, Freddie Steele and was distributed by Universal Pictures. == Other websites == * * * Category:1946 crime drama movies Category:1940s American crime drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Roy William Neill
title: Black Angel (1946 movie)
